txt.en: 'I believe these half-orcs are up to something, sneaking so close to Grimslade as they do. I would like to capture one and take him for questioning.\n\n'I will join you inside -- you should whistle for me when you've found a suitable prisoner, and I will take him to the jail in Grimslade.'
Húnbrit has asked you to capture a half-orc who may have information about the movements of the enemy.
'Here to capture me, are you? I'd like to see you try! The likes of you are no match for us.'
'Well done, [placeholder]! I will take this one to the jail at once. Perhaps we can get some information out of him.'
Dour Hal can be found in Fushum Raus.\n\nYou should do your best to capture Dour Hal and haul him in for questioning.
Húnbrit has appeared nearby in Fushum Raus.\n\nYou should speak with Húnbrit now that Dour Hal has been subdued.
